00037 #ifndef EGS_SCORING_
00038 #define EGS_SCORING_
00039

00063 class EGS_EXPORT EGS_ScoringSingle {
00064 
00065 public:
00066 
00068     EGS_ScoringSingle() : sum(0), sum2(0), tmp(0), current_ncase(0) {};
00069 
00078     inline void score(unsigned short ncase, EGS_Float f) {
00079         if (ncase == current_ncase) {
00080             tmp += f;
00081         }
00082         else {
00083             finishCase(ncase,f);
00084         }
00085     };
00086 
00090     inline void finishCase(unsigned short new_case, EGS_Float new_result) {
00091         current_ncase = new_case;
00092         sum += tmp;
00093         sum2 += tmp*tmp;
00094         tmp = new_result;
00095     };
00096 
00098     EGS_Float currentScore() const {
00099         return tmp;
00100     };
00101 
00104     void      currentScore(EGS_Float &s, unsigned short &ncase) const {
00105         s = tmp;
00106         ncase = current_ncase;
00107     };
00108 
00111     void      currentScore(double &s, double &s2) {
00112         s=sum;
00113         s2=sum2;
00114     };
00115 
00122     void      currentResult(EGS_I64 ncase, double &r, double &dr) {
00123         r = sum + tmp;
00124         dr = sum2 + tmp*tmp;
00125         r /= ncase;
00126         dr /= ncase;
00127         dr -= r*r;
00128         if (dr > 0) {
00129             dr = sqrt(dr/(ncase-1));
00130         }
00131     };
00132 
00144     bool storeState(ostream &data) {
00145         //sum += tmp; sum2 += tmp*tmp; tmp = 0;
00146         //data << current_ncase << "  " << sum << "  " << sum2 << endl;
00147         data << current_ncase << "  " << sum+tmp << "  " << sum2+tmp *tmp
00148              << endl;
00149         return data.good();
00150     };
00151 
00161     bool setState(istream &data) {
00162         data >> current_ncase >> sum >> sum2;
00163         tmp = 0;
00164         return data.good();
00165     };
00166 
00170     void reset() {
00171         current_ncase = 0;
00172         tmp = 0;
00173         sum = 0;
00174         sum2 = 0;
00175     };
00176 
00184     EGS_ScoringSingle &operator+=(const EGS_ScoringSingle &x) {
00185         sum += tmp + x.sum + x.tmp;
00186         sum2 += tmp*tmp + x.sum2 + x.tmp*x.tmp;
00187         current_ncase = 0;
00188         tmp = 0;
00189         return *this;
00190     };
00191 
00192 
00193 protected:
00194 
00196     double         sum;
00198     double         sum2;
00200     EGS_Float      tmp;
00202     unsigned short current_ncase;
00203 
00204 };
00205 
00219 class EGS_EXPORT EGS_ScoringArray {
00220 
00221 public:
00222 
00227     EGS_ScoringArray(int N);
00228 
00230     ~EGS_ScoringArray();
00231 
00237     void setHistory(EGS_I64 ncase);
00238 
00244     inline void score(int ireg, EGS_Float f) {
00245         result[ireg].score(current_ncase_short,f);
00246     };
00247 
00254     EGS_Float currentScore(int ireg) const {
00255         return result[ireg].currentScore();
00256     };
00257 
00259     EGS_Float thisHistoryScore(int ireg) const {
00260         EGS_Float res;
00261         unsigned short nc;
00262         result[ireg].currentScore(res,nc);
00263         return nc == current_ncase_short ? res : 0;
00264     };
00265 
00271     void currentScore(int ireg, double &s, double &s2) {
00272         result[ireg].currentScore(s,s2);
00273     };
00274 
00280     void currentResult(int ireg, double &r, double &dr) {
00281         result[ireg].currentResult(current_ncase,r,dr);
00282     };
00283 
00302     void reportResults(double norm, const char *title, bool relative_error,
00303                        const char *format = 0);
00304 
00316     bool storeState(ostream &data) {
00317         data << nreg << "  " << current_ncase_short << endl;
00318         if (!egsStoreI64(data,current_ncase)) {
00319             return false;
00320         }
00321         if (!egsStoreI64(data,current_ncase_65536)) {
00322             return false;
00323         }
00324         data << endl;
00325         for (int j=0; j<nreg; j++) {
00326             if (!result[j].storeState(data)) {
00327                 return false;
00328             }
00329         }
00330         return true;
00331     };
00332 
00340     bool setState(istream &data) {
00341         int nreg1;
00342         data >> nreg1 >> current_ncase_short;
00343         if (!data.good() || nreg1 < 1) {
00344             return false;
00345         }
00346         if (!egsGetI64(data,current_ncase)) {
00347             return false;
00348         }
00349         if (!egsGetI64(data,current_ncase_65536)) {
00350             return false;
00351         }
00352         if (nreg1 != nreg) {
00353             if (nreg > 0) {
00354                 delete [] result;
00355             }
00356             nreg = nreg1;
00357             result = new EGS_ScoringSingle [nreg];
00358         }
00359         for (int j=0; j<nreg; j++) {
00360             if (!result[j].setState(data)) {
00361                 return false;
00362             }
00363         }
00364         return true;
00365     };
00366 
00368     void reset() {
00369         current_ncase = 0;
00370         current_ncase_65536 = 0;
00371         current_ncase_short = 0;
00372         for (int j=0; j<nreg; j++) {
00373             result[j].reset();
00374         }
00375     };
00376 
00383     EGS_ScoringArray &operator+=(const EGS_ScoringArray &x) {
00384         current_ncase += x.current_ncase;
00385         current_ncase_65536 = current_ncase >> 16;
00386         EGS_I64 aux = current_ncase - (current_ncase_65536 << 16);
00387         current_ncase_short = (unsigned short) aux;
00388         for (int j=0; j<nreg; j++) {
00389             result[j] += x.result[j];
00390         }
00391         return *this;
00392     };
00393 
00398     int bins() const {
00399         return nreg;
00400     };
00401 
00406     int regions() const {
00407         return nreg;
00408     };
00409 
00410 protected:
00411 
00413     EGS_I64           current_ncase;
00415     EGS_I64           current_ncase_65536;
00418     int               nreg;
00420     EGS_ScoringSingle *result;
00425     unsigned short    current_ncase_short;
00426 
00427 };
